name: Magisk Besittning
description:
Submission for  Weekly Game Jam - Week 131
A simple mouse mouse only, though do prepare your finger, for all the fingering action it can take.

[Update 20-01-18]
Added instruction menu
Modified some attacks to include and Aoe type
Fixed some issues with the stage
Modified damage amount
